name: Zen Mosaics
description:
Restore a beautiful zen garden while enjoying a variety of nonogram picture puzzles!

Zen Mosaics takes the genre to a whole new level with new exciting power-ups, 120 custom build puzzles and
the endless mode that unlocks at the end of your journey.

Dive into an unique zen-like experience and have fun building your zen garden!

- 120 custom build puzzles also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers.

- 20 breathtaking locations

- A unique zen atmosphere

- Restore your zen garden
